net.proteusframework.cms.controller

Class LinkUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.cms.controller.LinkUtil

  • public final class LinkUtil
extends Object
    Place to collect link related functions during proteus reorganization project - temporary.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

    • Method Detail

      • currentPrincipalCanAccess

        public static boolean currentPrincipalCanAccess(net.proteusframework.internet.http.Link link)
        Test if the specified principal can access this link. Used for internal links.
        Parameters:
        link - the link.
        Returns:
        true or false. False indicates that a permission is required that the specified principal doesn't have.

      • getCMSLink

        public static net.proteusframework.internet.http.Link getCMSLink(PageElement pageElement)
        Get a link to a CMS page. This is a helper method for defining a link from a Page and optionally a page element path. This method defines the format for the Link URI for internal links.
        Parameters:
        pageElement - the PageElement.
        Returns:
        the Link.

      • getCMSLink

        public static net.proteusframework.internet.http.Link getCMSLink(PageElement pageElement,
                                                 List<String> encodedPath)
        Get a link to a CMS page. This is a helper method for defining a link from a Page and optionally a page element / delegate path. This method defines the format for the Link URI for internal links.
        Parameters:
        pageElement - the pageElement.
        encodedPath - the encoded path IDs. May be null.
        Returns:
        the Link.

      • getCMSLink

        public static net.proteusframework.internet.http.Link getCMSLink(PageElement pageElement,
                                                 @Nullable
                                                 PageElement... elementPath)
        Get a link to a CMS page. This is a helper method for defining a link from a Page and optionally a page element path. This method defines the format for the Link URI for internal links.
        Parameters:
        pageElement - the page.
        elementPath - the targeted page element path. May be null.
        Returns:
        the Link.

                                                 List<String> encodedPath)
        Get a link to a CMS page element.
        Parameters:

        encodedPath - the encoded path IDs. May be null.
        Returns:
        the Link.

      • getCMSLink

        public static net.proteusframework.internet.http.Link getCMSLink(URI fqURL)
                                                          throws IllegalArgumentException,
                                                                 com.i2rd.cms.page.InvalidInternalLinkException,
                                                                 NullPointerException
        Get a CMS link to a fully qualified URL. This method will return an internal link if the specified URL matches a CMS host and page. If the URL matches a CMS host, but doesn't match a CMS page on that host then a InvalidInternalLinkException is thrown.

        This is useful for translating URLs entered by keyboard into CMS compatible links.

        Parameters:
        fqURL - the URL. This URL must include a host part.
        Returns:
        the link.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the URL is missing the host.
        com.i2rd.cms.page.InvalidInternalLinkException - if the internal link specified is invalid.
        NullPointerException - if the parameter is null.

      • getCMSLink

        public static net.proteusframework.internet.http.Link getCMSLink(URI url,
                                                 CmsSite defaultSite)
                                                          throws IllegalArgumentException,
                                                                 com.i2rd.cms.page.InvalidInternalLinkException,
                                                                 NullPointerException
        Get the CMS link to a URL. It is assumed the URL is internal if it does not have a host specified. This is a convenience method that automatically adds the hostname of the specified defaultSite parameter if the URL does not have a host part specified. This method calls getCMSLink(URI) with the resulting URI from this operation.

        This is useful for translating URLs entered by keyboard into CMS compatible links.

        Parameters:
        url - the URL with or without a host part.
        defaultSite - the site to use if the URL does not have a host part.
        Returns:
        the link.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the URL is missing the host.
        com.i2rd.cms.page.InvalidInternalLinkException - if the internal link specified is invalid.
        NullPointerException - if either parameter is null.
        See Also:
        getCMSLink(URI)

        the path.
        Throws:

      • isInternal

        public static boolean isInternal(net.proteusframework.internet.http.Link link)
        Test if the link is internal to CMS.

        Implementation note:
        Internal links are in the form "cms:///${PageElement.getPathId()}/${PageElement.getId()}[/pepath/[[pg|bx|cb]#/] ]

        Parameters:
        link - the link.
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • principalCanAccess

        public static boolean principalCanAccess(net.proteusframework.internet.http.Link link,
                         net.proteusframework.users.model.Principal principal)
        Test if the specified principal can access this link. Used for internal links.
        Parameters:
        link - the link.
        principal - the user.
        Returns:
        true or false. False indicates that a permission is required that the specified principal doesn't have.

      • requiresAuthorizationToAccess

        public static boolean requiresAuthorizationToAccess(net.proteusframework.internet.http.Link link)
        Return true if the link points to a CMS url that requires authorization to access.
        Parameters:
        link - the link.
        Returns:
        true or false.
